aboutUsPage.title: BitTube Browser Extension
aboutUsPage.text1: BitTube browser extension implements a monetisation model called AirTime℠ into the browsing activity. It rewards website owners and visitors with cryptocurrency called TUBE. Additionally, its functions can be used for donations and transfer of value.
aboutUsPage.text2: After enabling the extension users can see their overall spent time on the Internet. Depending on how much time they spend on a particular website the underlying system monetises the webpages or the user account in cases the visited website is a social network.
aboutUsPage.text3: The extension’s adblocker removes website banners and tracking activity.
aboutUsPage.features1: Rewards your time spent on the Internet.
aboutUsPage.features3: Donate to websites and social media accounts.
aboutUsPage.features4: Link with your social accounts and website.
aboutUsPage.features5: Send TUBE cryptocurrency to other BitTube users.
aboutUsPage.features7: Buy TUBE coins with a Debit/Credit card or PayPal.
aboutUsPage.features8: Analyze statistics about your browsing history.
aboutUsPage.features9: Check all of your transaction history.
aboutUsPage.features10: Block ads, banners, popups and large media files.
aboutUsPage.features13: Earn TUBEs by sharing a personal referral link.
aboutUsPage.airTimeModelText: A network system that rewards Internet users with cryptocurrency called TUBE for their time spent on the Internet.
aboutUsPage.airtimeText: The total amount of time spent on the Internet with the browser extension enabled.
aboutUsPage.walletAddressText: A unique address that identifies where it sits on the blockchain. It’s the location at which the coin’s ownership data is stored and where any changes are registered when a transaction is sent or received. It is also known as Public Key.
aboutUsPage.privateKeyText: A string of numbers and letters that are used to access your wallet. While your wallet is represented by a public key, the private key is the password you should protect, as it acts as your digital signature.
aboutUsPage.viewWalletText: Only TUBE balance can be seen or it can be used to receive payments. Sending funds is disabled.
aboutUsPage.viewKeyText: A string of numbers and letters that are used to access your view only wallet.
aboutUsPage.confirmationText: When a BitTube transaction takes place, the blockchain confirms the transaction’s validity. The confirmation is done by the network every 120 seconds. The transaction is confirmed after at least 10 confirmations.
aboutUsPage.bitTubeBrowser: BitTube browser extension is developed by BitTube.

Uw order is succesvol aangemaakt.
